author: Bryony Gordon
title: Our mental health services are one of the great scandals of our time
text: Health Our mental health services are one of the great scandals of our time As Bootham Park Psychiatric Hospital is forced to close suddenly, Bryony Gordon wonders why Britain has such a Dickensian mental health system 'Our mental health services are one of the great scandals of our time' Photo: Getty Images
